title: Turkey and courgette meatloaf
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons oil', '1 onion, chopped', '4 garlic cloves, minced', '2 courgettes, sliced', '1/2 teaspoon chilli powder', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '500g turkey mince', '1 (400g) tin white beans, drained and rinsed', '2 teaspoons prepared mustard', '2 teaspoons Worcestershire sauce']
